Is there any way to create jobs and feed them to the crawler by the
command prompt? (that is without using the WUI)

To be more specific I want to create jobs from a particular profile by
giving the order.xml file of the profile I want to use as a command
parameter

The reason that I want to do this, is to automate the whole process:
set some cron jobs that will create jobs and feed the crawler at
certain time schedules

You can point me to documentation on this matters, if answering here
would be too much for the list

Thanks in advance
